features: Seal in freshness: Secure your baby's milk or formula with these screw lids compatible with Avent wide mouth bottles.
Easy to use: These travel caps feature a rewritable sealing disc that allows for easy labeling and organization.
Safe and durable: Made from high quality materials, these baby bottle caps are safe to use and can withstand frequent use and washing.
Designed specifically for Avent Wide Mouth Bottles with a 2.17" bottle mouth, our screw lids quickly and easily replace the natural bottle sealing ring and sealing disc.(4pcs)
Baby bottle caps are made of high quality materials that are durable and leak-proof, ensuring that your baby's milk or formula stays fresh and safe.
body.description: Are you tired of constantly worrying about spills and leaks when traveling with your baby bottles? Our Screw Lids Aka Travel Caps with Rewritable Sealing Disc Compatible with Avent Wide Mouth Bottles are the perfect solution for on-the-go parents. Our travel caps come in a set of 4 and are designed to fit Avent wide mouth bottles, making it easy to switch out old or worn out caps. The screw lids securely seal your bottle, ensuring that it stays leak-proof and spill-free. You can now travel with your bottles and not have to worry about cleaning up a mess afterwards. Made with high-quality materials, our Screw Lids Aka Travel Caps with Rewritable Sealing Disc Compatible with Avent Wide Mouth Bottles are durable and long-lasting, They are also easy to clean, making them a convenient and practical accessory for your baby bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Work great for Philips advent bottles!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I read milk should always be stored in a container with no air coming in. Unfortunately I have been storing milk in bottles with the nipples and cap on. I got these screw caps to store my breastmilk correctly. These screw caps work great for Avent wide mouth bottles. Avent doesn’t include screw caps with their bottles, but I’m glad I’m able to purchase screw caps separately. The screw caps helps cut down on washing parts because I can now pump directly into the bottle and then put the screw caps on afterwards. The screw caps are great as one piece because I won’t lose a part. The cap doesn’t leak because there is an o-ring inside to keep the seal tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars handy travel solution
reviews.reviewText: I recently tried out the bottle screw lids, and I must say, they offer a practical solution for on-the-go parents. While there are definite positives to these lids, I've also encountered a few minor drawbacks, which is why I'm giving them a 4-star review. These screw lids are a handy addition for parents who are often on the move. They offer a convenient way to seal baby bottles, preventing spills and leaks during travel. The rewritable sealing disc is a great idea, but I noticed that it can wear out or become less effective after a few uses.
